casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Foreclosure by ROGERS TOWNSEND & THOMAS, PC, Substitute Trustee of a Deed of Trust Executed by Julia Weskett Beasley, dated February 12, 2007 and recorded on February 16, 2007 in Book No. 1211 at Page 169 of the Carteret County Registry, North Carolina. No. 276PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Renner Jo St. John, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. Gregory M. Katzman, for Beasley, Julia Weskett. Joseph S. Dowdy, Raleigh, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. Donald Richard Pocock, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. D. Martin Warf, Raleigh, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of August 2015 by Respondent (Julia Weskett Beasley) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
